product_name: The North Face Warm Merino Zip Top - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: As a base layer or worn on its own, the women's Warm Merino zip top from The North Face provides moisture-wicking, quick drying comfort and next-to-skin warmth for your cold-weather adventures. Moisture-wicking merino wool, polyolefin and polyester fabric naturally resists odors. FlashDry(TM) micro-particles embedded in the fabric dramatically improve dry time and breathability. Made of crushed coconut shells and crushed volcanic rock, FlashDry micro-particles will not wash out. Flatlock seams; front zipper for ventilation, next-to-skin fit. Closeout.
short_description: As a base layer or worn on its own, the women's Warm Merino zip top from The North Face provides moisture-wicking, quick drying comfort and next-to-skin warmth for your cold-weather adventures.
